website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung WB350F compact camera is a slim shooter with a 21x zoom lens and Wi-Fi, but image noise is a serious drawback.

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I made over Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I was considering to to purchase a Nikon D5200 but it is very expensive. After flipping page after page for days looking for an alternative, I came across this camera. I wanted to be able to capture professional looking photos. To be honest, my first day with this camera, I fell in love with it. I couldn't put it down. It's so easy to navigate and there are so many features! I'll let the photos speak for themselves. The zoom is fantastic. The photo of the bird attached was taken 50 feet away. The clarity is amazing. I highly recommend this camera for someone who is considering to get a DSLR but cannot afford it yet.
customer_reviews.author: mgouridat

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst camera. I used it 10 times in 3 years, and it broke. When I try to take a picture, all it wants to do is run through all the menu choices for me. If you buy this camera, be sure to buy the 4 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: RottenMags

customer_reviews.title: Compact... very capable substitute for a DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I was going kayaking with my daughter and didn't want to haul my DSLR with me. This camera now goes everywhere with me and I don't feel at all hesitant using it when my DSLR isn't with me. It's very easy to get set up and start shooting with it. The WiFi is also very easy to set up for transferring images to other devices. It doesn't come with a dedicated battery charger... you charge it like you would your cell phone by plugging the USB cable into the phone. Images taken and the long end of the zoom are predictably not very sharp when used hand-held.
customer_reviews.author: GeoffVT

customer_reviews.title: Very poor choice of mine
customer_reviews.text: Very poor choice of mine! I even did quite a bit of research and found one long review from an apparent expert, which is why I purchased it. It went bad in approximately 6 months, would not turn on etc. The second most irritating thing about this camera is in handling the camera normally you were always changing the settings as they were very easily to move out of the setting you wanted. Learned to hate it, but it broke anyway, so I'm moving on with my new research to locate a better brand. I would not recommend this to a friend or enemy for that matter, Rick
customer_reviews.author: Richard Weber

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS LITTLE CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Easily connected to my Samsung Note 3. Love the remote view finder, touchscreen, flash intensity adjustment, mobile sharing over wi-fi, ability to share to multiple phones, and it takes wonderful pictures. Couple of Notes: You have to open the flash on the camera for it to work. While using Mobile view finder the Mp used while taking pics is whatever they are on your phone and not the max for the camera. However, the picture quality is nice and the 21X Optical Zoom works great! Will update after my beach trip but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: kjGAGirl

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG WB350F Smart WiFi Camera not so smart
customer_reviews.text: Received this and installed a Samsung brand 64gb Class 10 Micro SDXC up to 48mb/sec about a week ago. Camera produce unrecognizable files when attempting to capture videos. Worked part of the time on panorama shots, also producing unrecognizable files when it failed. Would not connect with Android phone wifi remote for more than about 20 seconds at a time. Very nice zoom. Took wonderful stills. Reformatted the memory card most of the times it suggested it, losing most of the captured stills, of course. Filled out customer support request two days ago. No response. Returned the camera today.
customer_reviews.author: MiniPilot

customer_reviews.title: and annoying automatic screen prompts for adjusting features that I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is disappointingly heavy and thick compared to some others, has a much larger delay before many shots, and annoying automatic screen prompts for adjusting features that I keep having to get rid of before I can take a pictures. Can't fit a flash diffuser on it either, and it suffers from mysterious battery drain issues that are unpredictable (sometimes you haul it out and it can only take a couple shots before dying, when you left it at 90% charge before). Under no circumstance get this camera if you want pictures of little kids. Other than that it is rugged and works.
customer_reviews.author: DadOf4

customer_reviews.title: DropBox Feature Does NOT Work
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work with DropBox. I bought this camera because the idea of uploading images directly from the camera to DropBox was appealing. It does not work and it is well-documented on the internet from other owners of this camera that the DropBox feature stopped working a few months ago. Furthermore, the camera is heavy and isn't really a pocket type of Point & Shoot camera. Poor documentation both in the box and on-line. Also, I tried the Picasa upload feature, which was interesting but I don't prefer to use Picasa...I just need to get the files into a cloud-based storage provider like DropBox. Fail!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Samsung product info is wrong, they agree, they don't care
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy camera if you read the Samsung info on product site. Says it will directly load pics and video to FB and you tube. Lies lies lies. Just spent two hours on support. Final Samsung answer is will load to fb but not to you tube. So sorry!!!!!!!! They now say you need to upgrade to ma more expensive model. The did not care about there false advertising. They admitted to it, but tough luck.
customer_reviews.author: Mary26

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy, Camera Dial Wears out Too Easy! Samsung won't Fix. Known Issue.
customer_reviews.text: Took great pictures for the first year but then my dial mode seem to have a life of it's own. I turn the camera on and it's in auto mode and then all these screens start up as if the dial mode is being rotated and I can't shoot the picture. Called Samsung no help, tried reset no good. I tried updating the firmware and it didn't work. Looks to be common problem with this model online. Now stuck with a camera that does what it wants. Next camera will not be a Samsung. Probably won't​ buy a camera through Amazon either as I can't exchange it. Disposable technology i guess.
customer_reviews.author: P. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: It's an easy to use camera that takes excellent pictures
customer_reviews.text: It's an easy to use camera that takes excellent pictures. I'm very pleased. The single design drawback I've encountered is the mode dial on the top of the camera. It turns much too easily, so while you think you've set a mode you're trying to work with, a light touch is all it takes to put you into another mode entirely, which you may not realize until you look at the pictures you thought you took but probably messed up because you may not have realized the dial spun from grazing it with your finger at some point. Otherwise, wonderful camera.
customer_reviews.author: Onam K. Emmet

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this because it had generally good reviews, a long zoom and the price was ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it had generally good reviews, a long zoom and the price was very reasonable. Fast forward 16 months and it is dead in the water. First it started taking bad pictures. On the automatic setting, the pictures sucked. They were dark, poor color, blurry, etc. Then, without warning, the camera would cycle through various setup screens. Finally the camera just ceased working all together. It won't boot up. The lens is extended and won't retract. In short, nada, zilch, zero...that's what we will be using this thing for.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Olcott

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Old Friend
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I've had in a LONG time! LOVE the excellent zoom, which comes in handy more often than you'd think. I've had this for over 2 years, and it works perfectly. I enjoy using the different modes, but generally just set it on AUTO and forget about it. I love the small size and intuitive controls. I use the timer often. Picture quality is good, but not perfect. I use photo-editing software anyway, so any shortcomings are easily overcome. Too bad that I dropped it a few times, and now, alas, the old friend has gone senile - taking pictures without pressing the button, not taking pictures when I do press it. Video mode is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Migliore

customer_reviews.title: I have used this camera only a little. Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I am the sort of person who reads a manual completely, often before I even buy something. I just couldn't bring myself to read the manual for this thing. So, I just started shooting with it. So far, I have figured everything out without problem except how to get the wifi connection to work. However, I should note my experience with cameras is minimal to say the least. I bought this so I could have something better than a phone to take pictures of the kids. I really thought about spending more money but from what I could tell, twice the money wouldn't buy me a much better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with a lot of features
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with a lot of features. The only thing I would ding this on is the ergonomics. Because of where the flash is located and the design of the camera body it can make holding the camera a little tricky when using the flash. If it could have been designed with enlarged grip area I would have given it a straight 5 star rating. The camera has tons of various settings and the ability to edit photos while still on the camera, plus it can be used with a smart phone to either download photos or use the phone as a remote viewer.
customer_reviews.author: zw

customer_reviews.title: The camera works fine. However
customer_reviews.text: The camera works fine. However, the major reason I got it was to upload photos directly to the cloud with wi-fi. By the time I had purchased the camera, the interfaces to some of the cloud services had changed. After upgrading the firmware, I discovered, all but Facebook-direct-to-cloud interfaces had been removed. It's been a long time now and the firmware has never been updated. As a result, the camera has largely never been used.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, but crappy images, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: With all of the great reviews I fully expected to love this camera. I'm not a camera buff at all, and don't know much about taking pictures, but this camera was disappointing. In the auto mode it took really crappy pictures unless there was a bright light and the subject was inanimate. I took some pictures of my baby niece and the color wasn't good at all. The zoom lens was remarkable, wifi was great and the size of the camera was great, but the photos were better on my iPhone, so I sent it back. I spent and extra $100 for the Nikon Coolpix P530 and am SO happy with the image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Great, and then not...
customer_reviews.text: It was a great little camera, until it recently started to have glitches with its software. After taking one or two pictures, it starts to cycle through its settings and other camera options completely on its own, and I couldn't find any rhyme or reason as to this issue. Samsung's webpage doesn't have any answer to a possible software issue, nor is there an update to address this problem. The pictures I did take with it came out great, but now I have to power it off, power it back on, take a picture, then repeat the power cycle process because of this problem. It could just be a random issue with just a handful of devices.
customer_reviews.author: HurleyP.

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pics but have had a problem from day one ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pics but have had a problem from day one with it switching picture modes on its own - especially from Auto to Program mode. It also is difficult to even get into Auto mode - the dial will be on Auto but the camera will be in wifi or program mode. Have missed multiple shots because it was switching modes. When it takes pics correctly they are great - which is why on balance a 3 out of 5 - though that is generous given that I stopped using the camera out of frustration. I have submitted a service request to Samsung so we'll see if the situation improves.
customer_reviews.author: Taz in CT

customer_reviews.title: But I am a big fan of this camera and recommend it highly
customer_reviews.text: This review isn't going to be as detailed and eloquent as most reviews are. But I am a big fan of this camera and recommend it highly. I use it most often to take pictures of the birds and (unfortunately) squirrels at the feeders outside my window and it gives amazing quality. The zoom (though I wish it were faster, which probably isn't possible) is awesome and enables me to get great shots. I don't have the expertise or experience to leave a more informative review, but I am completely happy with the purchase of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for, about, six months. No problems. Picture quality is great and easy to use. Better to use the programmable picture types (ie. Shutter speed) Auto doesn't take the greatest pictures, but not horrible, either. Wifi feature works great. Can email pictures, easily and can connect the camera to my phone. Have connected to a smart TV, as well. Phone feels solid and is a great size, perfect for hiking and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Cham

customer_reviews.title: I had the wb250f and loved it until I dropped it in the creek
customer_reviews.text: I had the wb250f and loved it until I dropped it in the creek. Bummer!!!!! So, I got this WB350F and love it even more. What a great Wi-Fi digital camera. It does all that I will ever want and more. The pictures print out like a pro on my HP printer. We have a Samsung Smart TV, so pictures get sent to it in a flash through Samsung link. Sending photos WI-FI is easy once you have it all set up. I could write nothing but great things about this camera, so instead of making a book, I will just say one last thing. Go Buy Yourself this camera......
customer_reviews.author: lubedude77

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB350F digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really had a chance to use it all that much. Can't get the Samsung web-site to download the instruction manual, so I can learn all about the camera. Think I have some settings that need changed, but not sure what they mean. Still trying to contact Samsung but get people who I can't understand on the phone, or someone who doesn't know anything about the camera. Hopefully, I'll be keeping it and be happy. It looks like what I was buying, and seems fairly easy to understand the flash, zoom, video, etc.
customer_reviews.author: gonecampn

customer_reviews.title: Cant upload any pictures to laptop or pc
customer_reviews.text: The camera is a decent camera. However, there seems to be a problem when trying to upload pictures via the provided usb cord. The ilauncher software does not seem to be installed correctly because the software does not start up at all. I have contact samsung to try and resolve the issue. No response as of yet....I've tried uploading to both a windows based and mac pc, neither will recognize the device.
customer_reviews.author: IMshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera ---
customer_reviews.text: The camera exceeded my expectations. It takes great pictures and I love the zoom. I used it for some low light settings indoors and the pictures were great. Not so great outdoors at night but that probably just means I need to read the directions on settings for low light outside. Once the subjects were placed in a setting with a little light outdoors, the pictures were fine. The pictures are clear and crisp and while I was a little concerned about the weight at first, that turned out to be a non-issue. It is a great camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: DELIVERED ON TIME AND IN PERFECT CONDITION
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS JUST WHAT I NEEDED. NO PROBLEMS. WELL WORTH THE MONEY. EVEN THOUGH THE CAMERA WAS NOT NEW IT LOOKS LIKE IT IS. THE CAMERA WAS SENT BY MOONLIGHT. THEY LIVED UP TO THEIR ADD. I WILL DEAL WITH MOONLIGHT AGAIN. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smart camera!
customer_reviews.text: Paid $143.00 for this awesome camera back in 2014-15, love the moble link,nfc my first smart camera. Iʻm very surprise to see a seller asking close to $500.00 for a 5 year old camera. Transfer photos to my ipad throuh mobile link without taking out card or using any card reader, just download their app.Love this camera would buy it again and i recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kaumakahia

customer_reviews.title: Our DSLR Replacement
customer_reviews.text: We have a really nice, high end DSLR. The problem is that we never take it places. It's too big. Instead, 95% of our photos are taken with our cell phones, especially since you often want to share the photos out immediately. This is small enough to be in a purse (It's a little big for a pocket, but it's doable for a zoo trip or something similar). It takes good quality photos, has a far superior zoom to a phone, and then lets us easily transfer the photos to our phones (Android) to share. For us, this is now our go-to camera.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good camera - but obviously a returned and/or used item.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this camera and it appears to be very nice so far and received very within two days with Prime. Good weight, nice size and easily handled. I'll try to update as I use it. On the bad side this is obviously a used returned camera and not new. Camera is in good condition; however box had been opened, accessories not in bags (bags just loose) and battery installed. Very disappointed in that as I don't normally buy refurbished, etc. Will need to go online and find out what should have been in box so that I can check that everything was received. Mostly concerned that it might not be a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: Terry P.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this camera! I can't beleive how clear the pictures are even when I zoom all the way. Clear, good color. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the display is so touch sensitive that I accidentally change the settings and have missed a couple pictures to get it set back to where I want. Good camera, but takes some time getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Myrn Mccord

customer_reviews.title: While smartphone camera's are nice and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Can't really beat it for the price. While smartphone camera's are nice and convenient, they are awful when trying to get a picture of nature in the distance (i.e. animals) as they lack the detail when you you have to crop the image down and digitally zoom. The Optical Zoom on this enabled me to get crystal clear shots of Bald Eagles and Whales on my Alaska trip. Try that with the best smartphone camera.
customer_reviews.author: C. Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday and so far, I love it!!!! Seems to be built very well and it's attractive. Also it's only about and inch wide except where the lens. Very compact. View screen is awesome! Comes with wrist strap, battery and wall plug/usb. Only downside was that the instructions were in every language BUT English in the first 3 or 4 pages in the instruction book. Had to figure some things out on my own by the very tiny photos.
customer_reviews.author: animalangel1

customer_reviews.title: Takes stellar pics!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! So, I bought a $250.00 Nikon 21X to bring on vacation with me and it was no different than my evil Sony 8X so, I returned it! Needed a new camera and got this for a fantastic price. I've only taken a shot or two but the difference is amazing! Love the touch screen and wireless capabilities. My only rift, seems to be a common theme with different manufacturers, the awkward placement of the flash. Other than that, this camera's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Knack4Technique

customer_reviews.title: this camera is easy for a beginner to use but still has some ...
customer_reviews.text: Slightly larger than the Panasonic Lumix it replaced, this camera is easy for a beginner to use but still has some advanced features. Menu structure is easy to use for common functions like timed shutter delay. Telephoto function has a "lag" and takes a bit of getting used to. Overall a very nice point-and-shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi works
customer_reviews.text: After some amount of fiddling with the software, it works. The whole point for me was remote control with an iPad. That way I can use it as a camera on the end of a "stick" to look at otherwise inaccessible areas. I would have given it a 5 star rating except it has an alternate plan B mini USB connection which requires an adaptor compared to every other mini USB device and cable I have. Yes it comes with a short adapter cable, but since when is only one of those adequate? Otherwise a great pocket camera with excellent function with remote use or not.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ruback

customer_reviews.title: A really nice camera and case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera and the Case Logic Compact Camera Case together. I like the red color as I can keep track of it easily. Used mainly for nature photos in nearby national park. Really like the long telephoto lens and the clear picture it takes. Handy neck strap on the case makes it easily accessible on walks. A really nice camera with a lot of features this old guy is still learning about. Great for photographing deer and birds. Recommend this combination of camera and case, the case is a snug fit but very protective.. Transfers pictures to computer easily and the clarity is amazing on computer screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Vacation Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! This was a perfect camera to have on our vacation. The size was perfect to drop in a bag or cargo pocket to have it easily accessible for quick pictures. The quality of pictures is fantastic too! All of our vacation pictures turned out great! The zoom is also pretty awesome. With a 21X zoom, I was able to take great pictures of areas we couldn't get too close to. No regrets with this camera. Loved everything about it! My daughters also loved the look and feel of it with the white faux leather. It feels good in your hands and cleans up easily. I recommend it 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Javi Rayo

customer_reviews.title: Problems from the get go.
customer_reviews.text: This one, my second, had issues from the start. Never really worked properly, switches itself out of "function" jumping around the menu by itself. Have just bought another, my third, to replace it. Good cameras, this was a bad one though.
customer_reviews.author: J Hynes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera since I want to take very good quality pictures of our new baby. The wi-fi enables me to quickly share the pictures with my family and even place them on the tv. I still take pictures with my phone, but the quality is definitely better with this camera. If you want to print the pictures afterwards, I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Especially for the price. It takes great, clear pictures, and color reproduction is spot-on. It has a ton of features and they all work, work well. My favorite feature is the Wi-Fi. It links to my Galaxy S3 and Laptop and I've never had any issues. The only shortfall I've noticed is that if a picture is modified on the camera (red-eye removal, cropping, filters, etc...) it reduces the picture size to 5 megapixels. I mostly post-process pictures, so this does not affect me very much. The built-in editing tools do what they should and do it well.
customer_reviews.author: jcampbell474

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera, It takes great pictures and I can download to my computer wirelessly! I like the one button video. I like the retro look. It has more weight than my Kodak, but I like that too. I like the pop up flash. I like the zoom. I also bought 2 additional batteries and a charger that charges outside of the camera,(faster) along with a car charger. You will need to get a micro sd card and then you are good to go. I am not a very good photographer....but I am getting better with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Don Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great point and shoot for the price. This thing uploads photos wirelessly! Let me say that again. You can take photos and they go right to your computer, iPhone, or Facebook. It's so easy it's almost scary. Be careful what you snap and upload. Ha! I use this for vacations or field trips where I don't want to take my DSLR or give to my 6 year old to work on her photography skills. It's cute too! I love the vintage look and the video quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherKel

customer_reviews.title: Rear touch screen is pretty fancy too
customer_reviews.text: Ten stars for styling. This thing is a gorgeous work of art, and anybody who sees it Oooohs and Aaaaahs at its craftsmanship. Rear touch screen is pretty fancy too. Unfortunately, it's a little too fiddly for me, enabling features more easily than it should. I'm a photographer, and I'd prefer to make my own choices than have a camera AI try to guess what I want and give it to me. Once you're past the learning curve you shouldn't need, it works fine and takes good quality pics and video.
customer_reviews.author: Donnaster

customer_reviews.title: Batter does not last as long as I would like it too
customer_reviews.text: I have taken over 5000 pictures with this camera. I am impressed with the resolution, but the pictures are not always sharp. Different parts of a picture that are taken from the same distance are often blurry. If I ask someone else to take a picture for me, the often don't wait for the green boxes to indicate focus (I suppose anyway). Also, can't figure out how to force the flash and so in light where a flash is needed as a filler. Batter does not last as long as I would like it too, but that's just being picky.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Mann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the end of August, but unfortunately it is malfunctioning already. When we try to take a picture, sometimes it spontaneously starts cycling through the menu. I tried to fill out the customer service warranty stuff, but it's a cumbersome process that ended in a spinning ball of death from Samsung. I've yet to find the time to try again. Pictures are very good, but this camera isn't the best in low light---images blur easily.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to set preferences; this model is not intuitive ...
customer_reviews.text: Complicated to set preferences; this model is not intuitive. Camera has started to cycle through menus and settings when attempting to take a photo. This seems to be a common problem according to other reviews. I'm going back to Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Margie R

customer_reviews.title: It's great. Too many buttons can make it a challenge ...
customer_reviews.text: We took it to Europe and back with us. It's great. Too many buttons can make it a challenge to use easily, though.
customer_reviews.author: MARLAN HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! I love having the capability to send pictures from my camera directly to my phone. I went hiking with it and took pictures and was able to send them to my phone while still in the woods. I bought this for my trip to the UK this summer and I know it'll be perfect. I wanted something small enough to fit in my purse and also didn't run on AA or AAA batteries and this ticks off all my must haves! I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone wanting a good, small camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: PHENOMENAL CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC!!!!! I didn't expect for this little "not so expensive" camera to be so GREAT. I was so surprised with its performance that I replaced my Nikon D3200 with it. I really liked my Nikon, BUT this camera is actually performing BETTER THAT my big camera which has 18-270mm on it. GREAT PICTURES GREAT PERFORMANCE - WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzana Jones

customer_reviews.title: Classic looks, Modern features
customer_reviews.text: Good looking model. I jumped right in without reading the manual and it is fairly intuitive. Similar controls and functions to my 6 yr old Lumix. it has a dedicated button for video, and I love the frame grab feature. I can use my Samsung S3 as a remote viewfinder to take group shots and still zoom and focus. it also doubles as a video baby monitor which is cool. I'm still learning, but it seems a little slow navigating between effects modes, and processing after shots. maybe they made it too fancy for the processor, but overall, I like it so far. I'll write an update in a few weeks once I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: erock

customer_reviews.title: I have a DSLR camera with telephoto lens and other lenses but sometimes I just want to carry around a lightweight camera - with
customer_reviews.text: Needed new smaller camera and this one fit the bill, with the plus of having wifi feature to send photo instantly directly from camera as long as in wifi area. I have a DSLR camera with telephoto lens and other lenses but sometimes I just want to carry around a lightweight camera - with quality features which works better than cell phone cameras and this bit the bill without costing too much!
customer_reviews.author: Amcan

customer_reviews.title: It was practically brand new.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it came with everything and it came in perfect condition. I'm no photographer but it serves its purpose. I bought this so I could have better 4x6 prints of my daughter for her baby albums. The prints I was getting from my camera phone was terrible. AV house responded quickly to my emails as well. I'm still getting the hang of it but will update my review after awhile. So far I am happy with my purchase. It was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: meemeiu

customer_reviews.title: An excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to go in extreme depth but I know this camera has the right number of features and is lightweight enough AND will support enough of a Zoom as to be quite useful for trips, family and sporting events, etc. It's fairly intuitive to use, as well, just give yourself a few minutes to learn the menus and know that you will get excellent, beautiful pictures with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost of Prime

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera. The faux leather look is cool. This camera starts up pretty fast, and the zoom is fantastic! Panorama setting is a little finicky, but overall it's a great point & shoot for the price. I got this case to go with it:
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: This camera is easy to use and has left me a satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and has left me a satisfied customer. I've already taken some great pictures with it and the results so far are excellent. I would probably rate this as more of camera for three types of people: beginners taking their first steps into photography, the everyday folk who want a cheap, reliable camera, and those that want quality without breaking the bank.It fits easily into my bag, so I can take it with me anywhere, and it feels great in my hands when I'm taking photos. So far I have encountered no problems, and hope to enjoy this product long into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: better focus, 1080P video than the 480P on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Point and Shoot Camera. My first was back in 2010 with a Canon Powershot now 2014 for the same price point of $150 this camera has OIS, better focus, 1080P video than the 480P on the Canon 16MP than the 10 on the canon, touchscreen, wireness photo tranfser to my HTC One M7, and finally it zoom 5.5X BETTER than Canon. From 2010 to 2014 this camera is a massive improvement to my Canon. One con is the fact that it is wider by 1/2 inches but it's worth it for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for a novice to play with. WIFI works well but I wish the process to transfer photos was a little easier. 4-21-17 - After about 3 years of use mostly at construction sites, hiking trails and the beach, the shutter button and control dial began to fail. However customer service for out of warranty repair was excellent and fast! They charged a flat $50 to fix everything and included free shipping both ways and I got the camera back in two weeks!!!
customer_reviews.author: AlexG

customer_reviews.title: Unusable, Unreturnable, Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: My lens stopped working shortly after I bought it which made the camera completely unusable. When the little motor that uncollapses the lens and opens the shutter in the front stops working, or if it never worked to begin with, then the camera is effectively bricked as there's no way to manually do anything with the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Stroud

customer_reviews.title: These things just keep getting better.
customer_reviews.text: Compact, light weight and feature packed. I can wireless transfer pictures and video from it to my Galaxy S-4. Nice lens from fairly wide wide angle (my favorite) to long telephoto. The back screen is touch screen. It has more programs then I will ever figure out, but easily takes nice pictures. I was not planning to buy a new camera, but I broke the one I was using, I am glad I bought this, these things just keep getting better.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and more. I don't have a smart phone any more and I needed an updated point and shoot. My previous camera was a Nikon that I purchased 4 years ago. SLOW. Ran out of battery fast. This one is fast and keeps a charge for a long time. Touch screen and HD video are added bonuses. I didn't have high expectations or lots of needs and this camera gave me everything I wanted and so much more.
customer_reviews.author: srvchrist

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice compact camera with a fantastic zoom! No it does not take as good of pictures as our Nikon SLR camera. However, the SLR stays home a lot while this little compact camera goes. It fits in a pocket nicely. It takes nice pictures. And all the wireless transfer features are great too. I can be at a location with no cell phone signal, and yet transfer a photo to another person's smartphone very easily. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MrGizmo

customer_reviews.title: Quality pics with nice zoom
customer_reviews.text: Good photo quality. The zoom is what separates this from just a smartphone. Took this on vacation. It was nice to be able to tranfer the pics wirelessly so that i could post them on fb during my vacations. Having a camera is nice too, so i dont drain my cell phone battery. Also, having a camera comes in handy for setting the camera down and taking group photos with the timer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect camera for me. I love to take pictures of my grandchildren cause I do a lot of scrapbooking, but know nothing about cameras.. This one tells you what to do for every occasion. Small so easy to keep handy and takes clear pictures with beautiful colors close up or far away. I also like that I can get my favorites directly to my face book page to keep family and friends up on how much the kids have grown. Definitely glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I think she's going to love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my wife . It was out of stock , but actually arrived on Christmas Eve ( thanks Amazon ! ). I think she's going to love this camera . The only negative comment that I have is regarding the lack of instructions - the quick start guide that comes with it is pretty useless . Looks like you have to go online to watch videos on how to operate the camera - my wife was not impressed with that .
customer_reviews.author: Reed Moore

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The program to extract the photos never worked on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Hill

customer_reviews.title: This is great second camera in my bag
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a while now before writing the review. This is great second camera in my bag and my wife took it to Europe. Everyone loved the WIFI feature and emailing pictures right off the camera to friends. Takes great pictures and has enough options to adjust for different shots. There are days I just don't want to take out my DSLR and get better pictures than the camera on my Phone.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mackel

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen froze, Lens cover stuck
customer_reviews.text: At first camera performed as expected. The camera was not used frequently, so when it began to malfunction I was surprised. The touch screen began freezing and could only be reset by removing the battery. Then the lens cover got stuck and would not open or close properly. Very frustrating to use camera now as we are beyond the return window. I have other Samsung product, but none performed as poorly as this camera. I could not recommend it so do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: grende

customer_reviews.title: Easy direct uploading to Facebook is what sold this for my mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loves that she can post photos directly to Facebook. My mom hated having to transfer photos to a computer to upload to Facebook. She also doesn't have a smartphone. This was one of the few cameras that didn't need a smartphone or tablet to transfer the photos to and then to upload to Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Bxstrb

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished like New!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe the zoom lens. Awesome camera. Have not tried the WiFi feature yet. Took a chance and bought a refurbished camera. Later, I learned that cameras refurbished by the manufacturer are just as good as new. Looking forward to creating my own photos for display in my new home.
customer_reviews.author: Aquafina

customer_reviews.title: Not for moving objects
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Europe. I like the quality of the photos it takes and that I could sync it to my Samsung phone. However the processing speed is too slow to take while moving. I had a lot of blurry pictures or missed a lot of pictures because by the time the picture was taken, the subject was not in view any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Abnsteve74

customer_reviews.title: ... a little frustrating- but the pictures it takes are nice and it is small -easy to carry in your ...
customer_reviews.text: didn't realize it does not have a view finder and there is a slight delay when pressing the button down to take a picture- I wish that was faster- it also is not compatible with an IPHONE- it should say this somewhere in their description but it does not- a little frustrating- but the pictures it takes are nice and it is small -easy to carry in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: clorox

customer_reviews.title: I am delighted with the photographic capabilities of this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with the photographic capabilities of this camera. I am DISAPPOINTED, however, that the WiFi elements of the camera for which it is touted do NOT work with my NOKIA Lumia Windows SmartPhone! There are apps for iPhones and Androids, but with a Windows phone I'm screwed [and there was no caveat before purchase]. I would probably have rated it five stars otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Rockstein

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon and this was a non warranty item ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a lemon and this was a non warranty item products of South America somewhere. Trying to take pictures every now and then it would flip through the menu on its own would require battery popped out to work again. Even updated firmware made no difference. Also is strange that does not have sensor to detect orientation. No exif will be written to the pictures and can not auto rotate afterwards with any program.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ahn

customer_reviews.title: Takes great photos, has great options for panoramic and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes great photos, has great options for panoramic and the ability to use a Samsung Galaxy phone as a viewfinder is awesome. Worked well on our honeymoon to Hawaii, and fulfills our need for a point-and-shoot digital camera. It was a difficult decision given the camera capabilities on phones these days, but we have been impressed and it took great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This thing was junk right out-of-the-box. Sometimes it will turn on and work right, most the time it won't. Went against my better judgment buying a Samsung product, won't make that mistake again don't do it either
customer_reviews.author: mike S.

customer_reviews.title: The zoom feature is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my sister as a gift so I can't comment on the camera overall. However, when I look at pictures she's taken at concerts, baseball games, and so on, I can say THE ZOOM IS AMAZING! Seriously, I have never known another camera to have such great zoom without an extra expensive lens added on to it. You would think she was sitting in the front row at every event because the pictures are so clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for outdoor pictures and any area with good light. The flash is pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous for outdoor pictures and any area with good light. The flash is pretty much useless... the light doesn't spread and the subject just looks white. I love the wireless aspects and it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMinton

customer_reviews.title: It takes decent pictures and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who wanted a camera other than what was on his cell phone. It takes decent pictures and is easy to use. He is not happy with the flash which has to be manually lifted out of the camera. He's worried it will be broken off eventually. It's easy to email or post pictures to his FB which are features he likes. For the money it is a pretty good camera.
customer_reviews.author: R M.

customer_reviews.title: so not impressed, but looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: OK so I was so excited to get this camera for my travels to India. Unfortunately the quality and resolution did not deliver. My camera i purchased 10 years ago has better quality. Really disappointed. Will probably never use again. The wifi does work pretty good and the camera looks pretty. Money not well spent
customer_reviews.author: johaira michelle

customer_reviews.title: I bought this camera less than a year ago. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera less than a year ago. I bought it straight from Samsung. It broke in less than 7 months. I barley used it in those 7 months. It probably started malfunctioning after the first 40 pictures. I tried to seek help from Samsung customer support, but their website wouldn't allow me to send a e-mail for technical support. Do not purchase this if you want a working camera. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: A very nice compact camera
customer_reviews.text: A very nice compact camera. It has a wide zoom range and good battery life. As with most cameras these days, I'll probably be dead before I completely understand all its functions and the awkward instruction manual doesn't help. BTW, the camera comes with almost no instructions, so be sure to download the manual from Samsung's web site.
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but maybe not all of them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera and it worked amazing. I loved it so much. The pictures came out amazing and were so clear. It unfortunately got stolen so I ordered another one. I felt that it didnt quite work the same as the first one. Three years later it's not working properly. I have it on auto and it will suddenly switch to other programs on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after it being listed as one of the best cameras of the year and it is a FANTASTIC little camera for the price! There are so many features -- the oil painting effect is LOVELY! Wifi -- fantastic! Upload straight from the camera. Bluetooth to the phone... so many features packed into a low priced camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger B.

customer_reviews.title: Fair Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved all the features and functions of this camera, however it stopped working properly after about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Larson

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this camera, its leather-like look, weight, size, picture and video quality, and having manual mode is awesome for taking pictures of the moon, for example. The only problem I had with this camera, is that the battery died after a couple of months, just bought a new one and replaced it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PRICE AND CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Wow, love it!! I had an older version, a smaller version and it was okay but this is so much better and really easy to use. I love how you can you your cell phone viewfinder, as I did with my other camera and how sturdy the body is. I do wish you could change the lenses but for the price, you can't beat it. I've been taking so many good pictures with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: good value with nice features
customer_reviews.text: This a great value for a basic camera for the nonprofessional photographer who wants something a step up from what a smartphone camera offers. Zoom and Panoramic options are impressive for the price. Wifi capability it really convenient feature. All in all you probably can't get much better value at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe C

customer_reviews.title: Would not connect to Wifi. Tried my hidden network ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to Wifi. Tried my hidden network and broadcast network with both 2.4 Ghz and 5 Ghz channels but kept failing connection. Minus 1 star. The silver part of the camera is very cheap looking plastic. Minus 1 star. Returned it and now waiting for the Panasonic ZS60 to be available in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Not a super tech girl
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera it was a perfect point and shoot that also let you use it as a more professional camera with fully adjustable features. My ex has this camera and I'm seriously considering buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cardinale

customer_reviews.title: WOW, great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures! We got this camera to take on a trip to Italy this summer and we were very, very happy and surprised how well the pictures turned out. My husband likes the Wi-Fi feature and says it works great also.Very lightweight and small, easy to carry in pocket or purse. It has a really great zoom feature. Would certainly highly recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Lee W.

customer_reviews.title: love it- great for emailing pictures right away-- & very ...
customer_reviews.text: love it- great for emailing pictures right away-- & very good zoom lens.- Sometimes the picture says on the screen long after its been shut off. Tried to do different things to shut it off but the battery gets drains- so I have to actually pull out the battery & then it goes off. This has happened just a few times-- where the picture stays on.Other than that it a perfect camera.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera-Recommend to Everyone
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this camera. Small footprint, but loaded with features. Really easy to operate and use the WiFi. I can carry in my purse so I always have my camera at hand.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super little camera and the picture quality is outstanding. It also picks up sound really well. I have to remember to turn down my speakers when I play back the videos. It works well in low light. I used it in a low light area of the aquarium the other day and was surprised at the quality of the playback.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Montague

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera! I would highly recommend it to anyone who wants a new point& shoot. Quality camera, great photos, and best of all it was simple to set up and use. It has a lot of great features I wasn't expecting but am glad it has. I'm going to buy another one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Cool camera, pretty easy to use. Takes FANTASTIC pictures! Just remember to purchase the SD card with the camera. Great camera for the money! I researched cameras and this takes fantastic photos, has touch screen and wireless capability for less than 150.00.
customer_reviews.author: mlmd

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but with problems
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera, it seems easy to operate but the instruction book sucks. Each item is listed with one line and them a picture to show you. The pictures are to hard to understand and I find it useless. It has been trial and error. They need to come up with something better. Had I known this a head of time I probably wouldn't have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth E. Long

customer_reviews.title: defective after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The problem is this...About 6 months after I bought it, I set the camera on AUTO and it starts to run through all the settings and I can not take a picture. Also, when I try to send on WiFi, the program shuts down in the middle of the operation. Checked out troubleshooting guides and there is no answer except maybe to send it back to Samsung for repair. This seems to be a common problem with this camera. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Patton

customer_reviews.title: TRACKING AF SETTINGS BUT YOU CAN ALSO SET IT TO AUTO AND GET A FAIRLY GOOD PHOTO
customer_reviews.text: NFC NEVER WORKED ON MY "PRINTER ENABLED NFC " OR ANYTHING ELSE A LOT OF COMPLICATED SETTINGS TO TAKE A PHOTO " WHITE BALANCE" SHUTTER SPEED" APERTURE SETTINGS, COLOR TEMP. ISO SETTINGS, PHOTO SIZE, AF SETTINGS, METERING SETTINGS, MOVIE SIZE, SETTINGS,TRACKING AF SETTINGS BUT YOU CAN ALSO SET IT TO AUTO AND GET A FAIRLY GOOD PHOTO
customer_reviews.author: james p russo

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Takes very good pictures. Settings are easy to get to. Compact size. Large touch screen. Cool retro design. Flash works reasonably well. Definitely worthwhile choice for people looking for a good, compact point & shoot that gives excellent results. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Very nice for the price. Fantastic zoom capability. 16MP is great for when you choose to crop a small area of picture taken.Takes very good pictures. The separate video start button is nice. A 32GB micro SD card (separately purchased) gave me approx 4000 picture capacity. Battery has good life. CONS: Constantly turning the selector knob by accident, as well as buttons too close to where any average person holds the camera, which puts inadvertent screens in the view of the wanted screen. No manual (Quick Guide only) must PDF online. Have yet to find out how to call up NFC mode, so I can send pics direct to my Samsung Galaxy S3.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: Samsung WB350F 16.3MP CMOS Smart WiFi & NFC Digital Camera with 21x Optical Zoom and 3.0" Touch Screen LCD and 1080p HD Video (White)
product_meta.description:
The WB350F is the perfect companion for photo-sharing enthusiasts everywhere thanks to its next-generation NFC and Wi-Fi connectivity. Equipped with Samsung"s brand new "Tag & Go" technology, the WB350F can connect to smartphones by simply touching the two devices together. Once paired, users have access to a host of intuitive features which make sharing images fun and simple. Photo Beam instantly transfers images being viewed on the camera to the paired smartphone, while with Auto Share, images are backed up instantaneously, as they are being taken. Using Mobile Link , photographers can select which shots they want to copy over to their smartphone, making it easy to organize the contents of the camera. Also in Remote Viewfinder mode, smartphones can be used to control the WB350F, allowing photographers to enjoy greater shooting freedom. In addition, this camera is capable of uploading original photographs directly to Dropbox.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Capture vibrant images--whether your subject is far away or up close--and share your pictures easily using the Samsung WB350 Smart Camera. Featuring a retro design with a modern touch, the WB350 contains a 16.3-megapixel sensor along with a 21x optical zoom and a 23-millimeter wide-angle lens. Wi-Fi capability makes it simple to send photos and videos or upload them to Facebook or Flickr.

The 16.3-megapixel BSI (backside-illuminated) CMOS sensor requires less light than conventional sensors.
View larger.

The Hybrid Touch User Interface offers two options: use the 5-way button or touchscreen. View larger.

All your photos and videos are wirelessly transferred and safely stored on your computer. View larger.

Use Remote Viewfinder to frame a group photo or zoom in and out using your smartphone. View larger.

16.3-MEGAPIXEL BACKSIDE-ILLUMINATED CMOS SENSOR
The Samsung WB350 Smart Camera is equipped with a 16.3-megapixel backside-illuminated (BSI) CMOS sensor that needs less light for proper exposure and quick focus than conventional sensors. This allows you to take properly exposed images in low-light situations. 

COMPOSE SHOTS ON A 3-INCH HYBRID TOUCH DISPLAY
On the back of the camera is a brilliant, 3-inch LCD display that lets you compose and review your photos comfortably and accurately. The display has a hybrid user interface that lets you use either the five-way button for menu navigation if you prefer traditional controls or your fingers if you prefer touch controls. 

21X ZOOM WITH WIDE-ANGLE LENS
With the WB350, you can capture the moment just the way you remember it--whether your subject is up close or far away. Snap a mural that takes up the side of a building, or a field of wildflowers that seems to stretch for miles, using the WB350's 23-millimeter wide-angle lens. Even when you can't get close to your subject, the 21x optical zoom allows you to capture every detail. 

WI-FI CONNECTIVITY FOR EASY SHARING
Thanks to built-in Wi-Fi capability, the WB350 makes it easy to post pictures and videos --along with comments--to Facebook, YouTube, Flickr, and other sites. You can also email files to friends and family members or use the Group Share function, which allows you to send images to up to four people simultaneously. The camera also comes with 2 GB of free Dropbox online storage or 50 GB if you also own a GALAXY smartphone. 

FULL HD VIDEO RECORDING
The WB350 captures lifelike video at 1080p Full HD resolution. The camera shoots video in the H.264 format, which allows you to record for longer than cameras using MJPEG video. 

SAVE PHOTOS IN REAL TIME WITH AUTOSHARE
With Samsung's AutoShare feature, you can send photos instantly to an NFC-compatible smartphone or tablet--just as you're shooting them--over a Wi-Fi connection. This makes it easy to back up photos and share them wherever you are. 

SAMSUNG LINK TO CONNECT WITH OTHER DEVICES
Thanks to Samsung Link, you can connect this camera wirelessly with other nearby Samsung Link-enabled devices and share photos and videos or upload them to your web storage service. 

PHOTO BEAM TO SHARE PHOTOS WITH ONE TOUCH
Like other Samsung devices, the WB350 features Photo Beam technology, which makes it a snap to share photos. Simply tap the camera on any NFC-compatible smartphone to automatically share whichever image you're currently viewing. 

TRANSFER FILES WITH PC AUTO BACKUP
Saving photos, video clips, and more to your computer is easy with the WB350. Just select the PC Auto Backup function, and the camera will wirelessly transfer all of the files on the camera to your PC or Mac. 

SEND FILES USING MOBILE LINK, EVEN WITHOUT WI-FI
Based on NFC technology, Samsung's Mobile Link app lets you select and send photos or albums to a designated smartphone or tablet, even when you're away from a Wi-Fi hotspot, and without having to send the photos as a text message or an email. The app also lets you manage photos on your smartphone and save the changes automatically to the camera. 

REMOTE VIEWFINDER TO CONTROL CAMERA AT A DISTANCE
When you connect the camera to select smartphones, you can use the Remote ViewFinder app to turn your phone into a viewfinder. You can control your camera from up to 30 feet away and preview images, adjust camera settings, frame the scene, and tag the shot location--all from your phone. When you need to take a group shot with yourself in it, Remote ViewFinder makes it easy. 

SMART MODE FOR SPECIAL EFFECTS
Tap the smart mode button to take advantage of numerous special shoot modes. Action Freeze mode lets you capture a high-speed scene at a sporting event, while Rich Tone can be used to create surrealistic photos with vibrant colors. 

DUAL CAPTURE TO SHOOT PHOTOS AND VIDEOS AT ONCE
The WB350's Dual Capture feature lets you snap photos while simultaneously shooting Full HD video. Record a soccer game while also capturing frame-worthy stills. 

FULL MANUAL MODE FOR CREATIVE CONTROL
Put the WB350 in Full Manual mode to take complete creative control of your pictures. Aperture Priority and Shutter Priority settings allow you to experiment with shutter speeds and depth of field, such as when you're shooting fast-moving images in low-light settings. 

RETRO DESIGN WITH MODERN TWIST
Inspired by vintage camera designs, the WB350 is notable for its elegant, flowing lines and luxurious leather-like feel. The WB350's compact and lightweight body makes it great for easy, on-the-go shooting. 

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS
The Samsung WB350 Smart Camera measures 2.56 by 4.47 by .98 inches (H x W x D) and weighs .48 pounds. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung WB350 Smart Camera, lithium-ion EA-SLB10A/WW battery, USB cable, power adapter, wrist strap, and quick start guide.

 WB350 SMART CAMERA
AT A GLANCE:
 * 16.3-megapixel BSI CMOS sensor for low-light conditions
 * 3-Inch hybrid touch display for intuitive operation
 * 21x optical zoom with a 23-millimeter wide-angle lens
 * Wi-Fi capability to post to Facebook and other online networks
 * 1080p Full HD video recording

The WB350 captures lifelike video at 1080p Full HD resolution. View larger.

Samsung AutoShare can automatically send photos to smartphones or tablets powered by NFC technology.
View larger.

Tap the Smart Mode button to access a range of shooting modes and special effects. View larger.
feature_bullets: Share your best photos instantly with Family and Friends with Built-in Wi-Fi with NFC
SMART features - Social Media Upload, E-mail, Photo beam, Direct Link, Mobile Link, PC Auto-backup, Remote Viewfinder, All Share
21x Optical Zoom for great shots up front or from a distance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars350 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
